snippet.title: BURGER CHASE (Supersoft) C64 Burger Time ripoff gameplay video
snippet.description:
I like this game, there is only one thing that bugs me....all the bits in CYAN don't make sense to be in CYAN (ie the chef's coat is CYAN and the albumen of the egg is CYAN) and clearly this code needs to be hacked to make the colour register into WHITE!!!!!

Plays nice actually, found myself playing this at 2.40am hmmmmm that probably wasn't a good idea considering I am in work 5 hours later.....ho hum....it's uploaded now and that's that.

I can sleep plenty when I am dead as the saying goes (or run out of lives as a C64 madman like me would say heh)
